TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDigitalSignature extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a digital signature for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 文档时，请使用而不是 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 。Use instead of when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 不 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 感知，并且不保证文档中的所有部分 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 都已完全签名。 is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document are fully signed. 有关数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章中提供的 *开放打包约定的数字签名框架* [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494) 。For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 有关详细信息， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 请参阅 \*XML 纸张规格 (XPS) \* 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

span.span: Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) Specification

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示更改文档的属性是否会使数字签名无效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.

value.span: 如果更改文档的属性会使签名无效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if changing the properties of the document invalidates the signature; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取签名的全局唯一标识符 (GUID)。

span.span: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) of the signature.
The GUID of the signature.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来显示和更新签名信息。The following example shows how to use the property to display and update signature information. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDefinitionsAndSigning.cs#iteratesignaturedefinitions)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedefinitionsandsigning.vb#iteratesignaturedefinitions)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCertificateAvailable As Boolean
public: property bool IsCertificateAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示签名者的 X.509 证书是否包含在文档 中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document .

value.span: 如果签名者的 X.509 证书嵌入文档 中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当参数设置为时，通过方法嵌入签名者的 x.509 证书 `embedCertificate` `true` 。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 有关数字签名和证书的详细信息，请参阅 " *开放打包约定* 规范" 中的 "3.3 数字签名" 部分，可供下载 。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignatureOriginRestricted As Boolean
public: property bool SignatureOriginRestricted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示其他人对包签名是否会使数字签名无效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.

value.span: 如果应用其他数字签名会使该签名无效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过 `restrictions` 将参数设置为排除部件时，使用方法设置签名源限制 。The signature origin restriction is set by the method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the part. 如果某个文档要由多个用户进行签名，则在 第一次对文档进行签名时需要从签名中排除该部分。If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed. 在对的调用的参数中指定 (排除项 `restrictions` 。 ) 如果 未排除部件，则任何其他签名将使第一个签名者的签名无效。(Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to .) If the part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer. 有关核心属性和签名源部件的详细信息，请参阅可供下载的 *开放打包约定* 规范的第3章 。For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerCertificate As X509Certificate

summary.span: 获取签名程序的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.

value.span: 签名程序的 X.509 证书；当文档包中未嵌入证书时，则为 。

span.span: The X.509 certificate of the signer; or when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当参数设置为时，通过方法嵌入签名者的 x.509 证书 `embedCertificate` `true` 。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 有关数字签名和证书的详细信息，请参阅 " *开放打包约定* 规范" 中的 "3.3 数字签名" 部分，可供下载 。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at .

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime SigningTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取创建签名的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.

value.span: 对页、文档或文档序列签名的日期和时间。

span.span: The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于发生签名的计算机的系统时间。 is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place. 不是 "安全时间戳"，不是来自受信任的时间戳颁发机构。 is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority. 安全时间戳必须通过受信任的时间戳颁发机构获取和应用。A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify() cil managed

summary.span: 根据中嵌入的 x.509 证书验证文档数字签名 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] .

returns.span: 指定验证尝试结果的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `embedCertificate` 参数设置为时，此重载方法会根据方法嵌入的 x.509 证书验证文档数字签名 `true` 。This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Function Verify (certificate As X509Certificate) As VerifyResult

span.span: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.

summary.span: 根据指定 X.509 证书验证文档数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 指定验证尝试结果的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 验证包中嵌入的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.

returns.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些枚举值指定验证尝试的结果。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的应用程序需要决定哪些标志对验证证书至关重要。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些证书验证可能需要 Internet 连接。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity. 当参数设置为时，通过方法嵌入签名者的 x.509 证书 `embedCertificate` `true` 。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate) As X509ChainStatusFlags

span.span: A certificate of authenticity.

summary.span: 验证指定的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些枚举值指定验证尝试的结果。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的应用程序需要决定哪些标志对验证证书至关重要。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些证书验证可能需要 Internet 连接。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
